• Dragons of Tarkir Mobile Spoiler

Lurking Arynx
4G
Creature - Cat Beast
U

Formidable - 2G: Target creature blocks Lurking Arynx this turn if able. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

Once it has your scent, it will hunt you from Gurmag Swamp to Ayagor.
